summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1657, for the improvement of West 62nd Street in the City of Seattle, from a point 350 feet west of the west margin of 22nd Avenue Northwest to 22nd Avenue Northwest by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 17536 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
